Uses of Package
otp.group6.audioeditor

  • Packages that use otp.group6.audioeditor 
    Package Description
    otp.group6.audioeditor  
    otp.group6.controller  
  • Classes in otp.group6.audioeditor used by otp.group6.audioeditor 
    Class and Description
    AudioCloudDAO
    AudioCloudDAO is a class that handles the database connection, user object and mixer settings object.
    AudioCloudDAO.MixerSetting
    MixerSettings class is used as an object to access the database mixer settings data in the main application.
    AudioCloudDAO.User
    Class Users is used as a object for the user while logged in.
    AudioManipulator
    AudioManipulator is a class that is used to create and operate the mixer.
    AudioRecorder
    Provides tools for basic audio recording and playback of that recorded file
    Soundboard
    Soundboard class for storing and playing sampled audio
    Soundboard.Sample
    Class for handling playable audio files as objects
    SoundboardPlayer
    Audio player class for soundboard
  • Classes in otp.group6.audioeditor used by otp.group6.controller 
    Class and Description
    AudioCloudDAO
    AudioCloudDAO is a class that handles the database connection, user object and mixer settings object.
    AudioCloudDAO.MixerSetting
    MixerSettings class is used as an object to access the database mixer settings data in the main application.
    AudioManipulator
    AudioManipulator is a class that is used to create and operate the mixer.
